application.name: funiq
application.description: deduplicates adjacent rows of data having common field values

option.name: fields
option.description: fields to consider in the deduplication

option.name: count
option.description: produce a count of duplicated lines

application.example: # deduplicate an impression file to get only the last impression of the day # per user gzdog Impression_123456_10-31-2005.log.gz | (read header; echo $header; \ sort -k 2,2 -k 1r,1r -t `tochar 0xfe`) | funiq -d `tochar 0xfe` -f 2 > 2005-10-31.log
